description: An MCP server that integrates with Discord to provide AI-powered features.

discordToken.description: Discord bot token. Obtain this from the Discord Developer Portal.

capabilities.name: discord_create_category
capabilities.description: Creates a new category in a Discord server.

capabilities.name: discord_edit_category
capabilities.description: Edits an existing Discord category (name and position).

capabilities.name: discord_delete_category
capabilities.description: Deletes a Discord category by ID.

capabilities.name: discord_login
capabilities.description: Logs in to Discord using the configured token

capabilities.name: discord_send
capabilities.description: Sends a message to one or more Discord text channels by name in a server

capabilities.name: discord_get_forum_channels
capabilities.description: Lists all forum channels in a specified Discord server (guild)

capabilities.name: discord_create_forum_post
capabilities.description: Creates a new post in a Discord forum channel with optional tags

capabilities.name: discord_get_forum_post
capabilities.description: Retrieves details about a forum post including its messages

capabilities.name: discord_reply_to_forum
capabilities.description: Adds a reply to an existing forum post or thread

capabilities.name: discord_create_text_channel
capabilities.description: Creates a new text channel in a Discord server with an optional topic

capabilities.name: discord_delete_channel
capabilities.description: Deletes a Discord channel with an optional reason

capabilities.name: discord_read_messages
capabilities.description: Retrieves messages from a Discord text channel with a configurable limit

capabilities.name: discord_get_server_info
capabilities.description: Retrieves detailed information about a Discord server including channels and member count

capabilities.name: discord_add_reaction
capabilities.description: Adds an emoji reaction to a specific Discord message

capabilities.name: discord_add_multiple_reactions
capabilities.description: Adds multiple emoji reactions to a Discord message at once

capabilities.name: discord_remove_reaction
capabilities.description: Removes a specific emoji reaction from a Discord message

capabilities.name: discord_delete_forum_post
capabilities.description: Deletes a forum post or thread with an optional reason

capabilities.name: discord_delete_message
capabilities.description: Deletes a specific message from a Discord text channel

capabilities.name: discord_create_webhook
capabilities.description: Creates a new webhook for a Discord channel

capabilities.name: discord_send_webhook_message
capabilities.description: Sends a message to a Discord channel using a webhook

capabilities.name: discord_edit_webhook
capabilities.description: Edits an existing webhook for a Discord channel

capabilities.name: discord_delete_webhook
capabilities.description: Deletes an existing webhook for a Discord channel
